column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Even though the name " Bar and Boeuf" evokes thoughts of a steakhouse
column2: Bavette's  menu is far more eclectic.  The steak house classics are available ( you know the drill..... wedge salad
column6: the 1 pound baked potato.  )  So if you feel the need to not stray too outside your culinary box
column7: you can order virtually almost the same type of things you get  at Ruth Chris
